name: Loki-Err0r
description:
Directed By

Ilkin Alizade

Music By Natalie Holt

You did not do What You Should do in Your 

prophecy.

You are Called Variant if you break Timeline and Place You Come is called TVA.

And You Escaped From There After You learned most of TVA workers will wipe You

for Their Glorious Purpose.

But You Escaped To Planet Which will be Destroyed by its own Moon.

You Should Find Ticket And get to Cosmic Ship for  escaping  This Planet.

if You Can Find Ticket you can easly get to ship, but if you don't then you should use force.

Good Luck in this Mission.

Dont Forget To reach Cosmic Ship in Time.

Game By Ilkin Alizade.

Adopted From LOKI.

Play And See Some Details. There are not so much serious Work Because I couldn't Afford To get 3d Models & Some Stuffs But Don't Worry It is Interesting To Play

Move - W, A, S, D

Faster - Left Shift

Jump - Space
